column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I've been to many museums around the world
column2: the Art Institute stands hands and shoulders above most. The curator did a great job with layout and placement of the art so there is a natural flow
column3: that keeps you intrigued and yearning for more. So many pieces I have been wanting to see all my life
column4: seeing all the Picasso's and "A Sunday On La Grande Jatte" were as good as advertised.
